paper_abstract: In this paper, we introduced the notion of n-fold obstinate filter in BL-algebras and we stated and proved some theorems, which determine the relationship between this notion and other types of n-fold filters in a BL-algebra. We proved that if F is a 1-fold obstinate filter, then A/F is a Boolean algebra. Several characterizations of n-fold fantastic filters are given, and we show that A is a n-fold fantastic BL-algebra if A is a MV-algebra (n >= 1) and A is a 1-fold positive implicative BL-algebra if A is a Boolean algebra. Finally, we construct some algorithms for studying the structure of the finite BL-algebras and n-fold filters in finite BL-algebras.
